title: White House Announces 'Cybersecurity Sprint' In Response To OPM Hack
teaser: A House panel is looking into the massive data breach revealed earlier this month that affected millions of current and former federal workers. As a result of the hack, the Obama administration has ordered what its calling a "30-day cybersecurity sprint" to better protect federal information. Is it window dressing or something substantive?
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
